name: Keep On Carving
description:
Keep On Carving

A retro-style, skateboarding infinite runner. Dodge the bins, collect the coins and get the highest score you can!

Keep on carving was developed in 3 weeks as part of a 3-games in 3-months challenge I set for myself. All art and sounds are original.

Controls

Move up a lane - W or Up Arrow

Move down a lane - S or Down Arrow

Jump - spacebar
